revised_title: Proceedings of the Royal Society of London Annual Meeting and Papers Read
semantic_tags: Papers on Sensitiveness of Retina, Heart Sound, Human Skeleton, Ancestral Heritage, and Magnetic Field Influence
tldr: The Royal Society held its annual meeting for the election of fellows and discussed various papers on topics such as the sensitiveness of the retina, the mechanism of the first heart sound, the variability of the human skeleton, the average contribution of ancestors to offspring, and the influence of a magnetic field on radiation frequency.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Scientific Meetings and Communication
